features: Dual band router upgrades to 1200 Mbps high speed internet (300mbps for 2.4GHz plus 900Mbps for 5GHz), reducing buffering and ideal for 4K stream
Full Gigabit Ports - Gigabit Router with 4 Gigabit LAN ports, ideal for any internet plan and allow you to directly connect your wired devices
Boosted Coverage - Four external antennas equipped with Beamforming technology extend and concentrate the Wi-Fi signals
MU-MIMO technology - (5GHz band) allows high speeds for multiple devices simultaneously
Access Point Mode - Supports AP Mode to transform your wired connection into wireless network, an ideal wireless router for home
Advanced Security with WPA3 - The latest Wi-Fi security protocol, WPA3, brings new capabilities to improve cybersecurity in personal networks
TP-Link OneMesh- A simple way to form a WiFi network with a single Wi-Fi name for seamless whole-home coverage by adding a OneMesh WiFi Extender
Works with all internet service providers, such as AT&T, Verizon, Xfinity, Spectrum, RCN, Cox, CenturyLink, Frontier, etc.( a modem is required for most internet service providers)
body.description: Smooth Entertainment with AC1200 Dual Band Wi-Fi The Archer A6 V3 creates a reliable and blazing-fast network powered by 802.11ac Wi-Fi technology. The 2.4GHz band delivers speeds up to 300Mbps, ready for everyday tasks like emailing and web browsing, while the 5GHz band delivers speeds up to 867Mbps, ideal for HD video streaming and lag-free online gaming. Easy Setup and Management with the Tether APP The free Tether app is available for both Android and iOS devices, making it easy to set up the Archer A6 and manage your network settings.；The product is multiple voltage compatible, that voltage arrange is 100-240V.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Smooth Enterainment with AC1200 Dual-band Wi-Fi The Archer A6 creates a reliable and blazing-fast network powered by 802.11ac WiFi technology. The 2.4 GHz band gives you faster email and web browsing, while the 5 GHz band can provide faster speeds for lag-free online gaming and HD video streaming.

Boosted Coverage Throughout Your Home Four external antennas and a powerful chipset work together to send WiFi to every corner of your home. Beamforming technology detects devices and concentrates wireless signal strength towards them. Stay connected and enjoy fast WiFi whether you’re lounging on the sofa or relaxing on the balcony.

MU-MIMO Brings More Simultaneous Connections MU-MIMO lets the Archer A6 serve multiple devices at once. No more bandwidth congestion or latency. All devices receive their data faster and Wi-Fi is used more efficiently!

TP-Link OneMesh: Create Your Own Whole-Home Mesh Network OneMesh is a simple way to form a Mesh network with a single Wi-Fi name for seamless whole-home coverage. Just connect a OneMesh range extender to a OneMesh router. No more searching around for a stable connection.

Gigabit Connectivity, 10x Faster With one Gigabit WAN port and four Gigabit LAN ports, speeds can be up to 10× faster than standard Ethernet connections. Connect your favorite wired devices for faster, more reliable connections.

Easy Setup and Use Set up and manage your Archer A6 router in minutes with the free Tether App available for both Android and iOS devices. Advanced Security with WPA3 More secure encryption in Wi-Fi password safety and enhanced protection against brute-force attacks combine to safeguard your home Wi-Fi.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install and works fine.
reviews.reviewText: My headline says it all. Very attractively priced and it was installed and setup in about 20 minutes. The wifi signal seems quite strong and stable. The 4 antennae are a little unusual but my wife thinks it makes my computer station look very high tech, which I guess is a plus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent router for the price
reviews.reviewText: The TP-Link AC1200 is a decent affordable route with good features. I have always been a fan of TP-Link products, as I also own a TP-Link switch. I replaced my Spectrum router with this one and it works great, so it does work for Spectrum for those who are wondering about it. The router supports WiFi 5 (802.11ac), and has the ability for smart connection (the ability to combine 2g and 5g bands into one channel). It also has the ability of WPA3 encryption which is always important for WiFi users. The router has a user friendly GUI, it’s very well organized and easily manageable. Has 1 WAN port and 4 LAN ports for ethernet connection. I’m overall satisfied with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Amazing in certain applications, not so good in others
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to extend the WiFi range in my household, one end of the house has Gigabyte internet with Frontier router 1000mbps up and 1000mbps down. WiFi however, the speeds get turned down to about 500mbps if near the router, and only a mere 20mbps on the other side of the house.I originally tested this router as a replacement to the one issued by the internet company. The results were not amazing (as expected) it performed on the same level as my original router with little to no increase on the other side of the house.On my second test, I ran a internet cable from one end of the house to the other and connecting this router to the original one from my internet provider. After setting it up as an access point for it. I now receive constant speeds all around the house. One router handling traffic of one side of the house. While this one manages the other side.Set up was relatively easy, and have not had to manage it since it was set up. For the price, functionally is good, and rage was as expected. I would definitely recommend. However, if you are looking to cover a big house with this router I would look elsewhere, or investing in their mesh network. It allows for you to hook up various routers into one single mesh network which can operate seamlessly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works as advertised. Fast ethernet ports so great for router in room and wifi around house. Doesn't go through two floors well but didn't expect it to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ease of use and installation.
reviews.reviewText: Reasonable priced. Works ok for everything I have connected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to set up if you follow the instructions.
reviews.reviewText: Works great for my house. It was easy to set up when I actually read and followed the instructions. Go figure.lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Just installed and it works fine. Thanks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Customer Service
reviews.reviewText: I had to contact Technical Support a few days after another call as my connected equipment kept losing their IP Address. The Agent (Glen Ford) helped my discover that my configuration was incorrect.I had an Ethernet Switch between my modem and router - with equipment connected to the switch. Since my modem only issues one IP Address (the modem has a single ethernet port), my connected equipment was batteling for that single address and my computer directly connected to the router was losing connectivity every time the router power was reset. The agent instructed I completely remove the switch (it acted more like a splitter than intelligent) and directly connect my router to the modem. I used the router ports for my near by equipment and connected my second router (other end of house) to the first and after setting separate IP addresses for each router, it all works steady now.Mr Ford was very patient with me, knowledgeable and knew just the right time to call in other tech support to validate the thinking. In an age where most software and hardware vendors hide their phone number or simply don't make it known, TP-Link is right their. They also have live chat support 24 hours a day.
Works great for my 700 sq ft Cabin. No issues.
Muy buen producto cumple con lo que promete ,recomendado.
Product worked as described. Excellent speed and easy setup. A+
Excelente producto, muy buena calidad, muy buena señal y recepcion de la misma, mejoró en los 3 pisos.
Este router mejoro por mucho mi anterior conexión, la característica de mimo controla muy bien la llegada de paquetes lo que lo hace mas rapido
